text:
When I use openldap-2.1.16 complie with apache 2.0.44,When I 
follow ./configure --help step,I use the "--enable-ldap", the configure is 
OK,But when I make my apache 2.0.44,It's shown util_ldap.lo make error,
But I try to use "./configure --with-ldap",This problem is resolve,so I think 
here has some question with "./configure --help"  messages~

Thanks and Best Regards,
I love apache so much~
MCSE/Jerry Wang

The correct way to build this is to

a) enable LDAP support in APR
b) enable mod_ldap (the LDAP caching module)
c) enable mod_auth_ldap (the LDAP auth module)

To do this run:

./configure --with-ldap --enable-auth-ldap --enable-ldap
